text: Chaka Demus and Pliers are a Jamaican reggae duo made up of deejay Chaka Demus (born John Taylor) and singer Pliers (born Everton Bonner), both famous for their hits "Tease Me" and "Murder She Wrote". As a duo, they both enjoyed more fans in the early 90s rather than their previous separate careers. ==References== Category:Jamaican reggae musicians Category:Reggae bands
title: Chaka Demus and Pliers
